name: mucke.online
description: no ads, no registration, just enjoy free online radio from around the world

scripts.build: npm run angularfix && cordova build android --debug
scripts.build:device: npm run angularfix && cordova run android --device --debug
scripts.build:device:log: npm run angularfix && cordova run android --device && adb -d logcat chromium:I *:S
scripts.build:release: npm run angularfix && cordova build --release android -- --versionCode=3
scripts.angularfix: npm run replace_scripttag && npm run replace_asseturl_es5 && npm run replace_asseturl_es2015

author: Moritz Petzka
